import React from 'react' import '../styles/toolbar.scss' import toolState from '../store/toolState.js' import canvasState from '../store/canvasState' import Brush from '../tools/Brush' import Rect from '../tools/Rect' import Eraser from '../tools/Eraser' import Line from '../tools/Line' import Circle from '../tools/Circle' const Toolbar = () => { const changeColor = (e) => { this.toolState.setStrokeColor(e.target.value) this.toolState.setFillColor(e.target.value) console.log(e.target.value) } return (
) } export default Toolbar
